public class TourGenerator

    • TourGenerator

      public TourGenerator​(TSP1 tsp, PlanningRequest pr, GraphProcessor gp, Map map)
      Create a tour generator used to be notified whenever a new best tour is found by the algorithm
      Parameters:
      tsp - the travelling salesman algorithm running
      pr - the planning request of the current computed tour
      gp - the graph processor processing the current t
      map - the current map
